home_header_content_h2_1: Always stay in touch with your friends using Cogeo.
home_about_title: We have what you are looking for.
home_about_text_1: Create your groups and invite your friends
home_about_text_2: Communicate through channels or instant messaging
home_communication_groups_text_1: A group allows to connect people to communicate on a common theme.
home_communication_groups_text_3: Invite your friends by mail or send them an invitation link.
home_communication_channels_text_1: A channel allows to communicate with several people on a specific subject within a group.
home_communication_channels_text_2: All members of the group can join him unless he is private.
home_communication_channels_text_3: You can write, insert photos, videos, share documents, ...
home_communication_message_text_1: In the same way as for channels, you can chat with your friends with all the advantages that this implies.
home_communication_message_text_2: This conversation is of course private.
home_communication_micro_text_1: Both in the channels and in the instant messaging, you can write but also phone !
home_communication_micro_text_2: Use Cogeo to make group calls with webcam is therefore a child's play.
home_bot_header_2: Spamobot and Friendybot are there for you.
home_bot_spamobot_text_1: Spamobot was a helpful person. But that was before.
home_bot_spamobot_text_2: Today, he only sends messages, a lot of messages.
home_bot_spamobot_text_3: Don't ask him something, he will not answer. At least for now...
home_bot_friendybot_text_1: Make no mistake, Friendybot is very friendly.
home_bot_friendybot_text_2: He will never lets you down and no matter what the situation !
home_bot_friendybot_text_3: In addition, he is sometimes very funny! I assure you.
home_contact_devices_text_1: It is compatible on all platforms and for all resolutions.
home_contact_devices_text_2: Keep in touch is paramount. You will have no more excuses.
home_services_1_text: Designed with the latest technologies and optimized for speed
home_services_2_text: We are interested in trends to make you feel comfortable on our app
home_services_3_text: We try to make and refined in order to remain focused on the discussion
home_services_4_text: Edit your preferences to improve at your leisure Cogeo
